name: A Letter to Haedrics Wife
description:
You are a mailman and you have a letter for haedrics wife which you have to deliver. This might seem easy, but it comes with some challenges and you might find yourself back where you started sooner than you know.

The game might take a minute to load. Just give it a second ;)

DISCLAIMER:
This game contains written descriptions of alcohol use, death and suggestive topics.

A game by @AndideBob and @ToastiChron

Music by Kevin MacLeod
